text: Paola Medina Montero (born 1 December 1985) is a female water polo player from Puerto Rico. She participated at the 2007 World Aquatics Championships and 2019 Pan American Games. She played for California State University, Bakersfield's women's water polo team. == References == == Other websites == * paola-medina-montero, swimswam * Paola+Medina+Montero zimbio * paola-medina- montero getty Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:American water polo players Category:Sportspeople from Puerto Rico
title: Paola Medina
